parsed.context: WBC lightweight title defense between Thai ring general and hungry challenger
fighter1_edge: Exceptional footwork and distance management skills
Proven title-holding experience at elite level
fighter2_edge: Aggressive forward pressure and relentless pace
Strong power and knockout punching ability
parsed.what_to_watch: Monitor Niyomtrong's ring control and lateral movement in early rounds. Zarate's ability to cut the ring and land clean combinations will determine if this becomes competitive.

parsed.context: Ferreira defends IBF lightweight title against Turhan in crucial title bout
fighter1_edge: Proven world-class technical boxing at elite level
fighter2_edge: Aggressive forward pressure disrupts established opponents
Power punching threatens at any moment
parsed.what_to_watch: Monitor how Ferreira's footwork handles Turhan's relentless pace early. Watch for Turhan's ability to close distance and whether Ferreira's boxing IQ keeps her safe.
